name: Void Transporter
description:
Created at HakJam 2022. A week to work on something different and to explore ideas.
I have always wanted to create a ship controllers in which you carve and work the throttle.
Enemy are pretty dumb because that was not the focus for me for this prototype. They will continuously spawn.

Controls:

Keyboard & Mouse

A - D :   Turn

Q - E :   Strafe

Space:   Thrust

CTRL:   Brake

 SHIFT:   Boost

Mouse1:  Primary Fire

 Mouse2:  Secondary Fire

Xbox Controller

  Left Stick :   Turn

 Bumpers :   Strafe

  Right Trigger:   Thrust

Left Trigger:   Brake

X:   Boost

A:  Primary Fire

 B:  Secondary Fire
